name: 詹姆斯·瓦特
bio_short: 苏格兰发明家和机械工程师。他对纽科门蒸汽机的“分离式冷凝器”等改进，极大地提高了效率，使蒸汽机成为工业革命的动力心脏。
bio_short_en: A Scottish inventor and mechanical engineer. His improvements to the Newcomen engine, chiefly the 'separate condenser', dramatically increased its efficiency, making the steam engine the power source of the Industrial Revolution.
